channel.title: Picsart Background Remover and Image Enhancer
channel.description: Elevate your Sketch designs with the Picsart Plugin: effortlessly remove backgrounds from product photos, cars, furniture, jewelry, and more, and upscale images by up to 8x per side (64x resolution). Achieve clean, high-quality visuals directly in Sketch with AI-powered tools that streamline your creative process.

item.title: Picsart Sketch Plugin v1.0.0
item.description: Initial release of the Picsart API Plugin, featuring background removal and image enhancement.
